description: React component implementing a sidebar navigation and tags list for a note-taking application, utilizing context for state management.

methods.name: Sidebar()
methods.description: Functional React component rendering a sidebar with navigation options and tag management.

methods.name: go
methods.description: Sets the current view/filter based on user selection.

methods.name: active
methods.description: Determines whether a navigation item is the active view.

methods.name: addTag
methods.description: Handles adding a new tag when the form is submitted.
